oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Harris Motor Court and Restaurant, Bean Station, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two color chrome photographs of the pool and buildings at the Harris Motor Court and Restaurant located in Bean Station, Tennessee. Features a divided back and narrative on reverse. [No. 61808]
